posts.title: The Orson Welles Sketchbook
posts.excerpt: Orson Welles’ BBC series is basically a bunch of monologues by Welles, with some illustrations by Welles, about — theatre; theatre critics; voodoo magic used to kill theatre critics; bullfighting; customs officers; the false nose; and many other topics, all connected to Welles’ career in film, theatre and radio. posts._title: Jirí Menzel – Ostre sledované vlaky AKA Closely Watched Trains (1966)
posts.title: Ostre sledované vlaky
posts.excerpt: Quote: “The entire town knows that I want to be a train dispatcher for the simple reason that I don’t want to do anything?just like my ancestors?but stand on the platform with a signal disc and avoid any hard work, while others have to drudge and toil.” – Milos Hrma
